io.sarl.core

Class Destroy

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.sarl.lang.core.Event
      • io.sarl.core.Destroy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public final class Destroy
extends Event
    Notifies the Destruction of the agent. The source of this event is the agent itself. Usually, this event is fired after the agent has called the killMe action. This event is only received by the agent's internal behaviors, not the member since to call killMe action it must remain any member.

    This event is marked as an early exit event. It means that any action that is firing this event is supposed to never return, e.g. the killMe action.

    See Also:
    Serialized Form
